history.proof: intros c. induction m as [|x xs IHm]. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite -> IHm. rewrite -> restrict_code_encode_incl. + shelve. + shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} m : list A c : code A x : A xs : list A IHm : encode eqA_dec c xs = encode eqA_dec (restrict_code xs c) xs Unable to unify "find_code eqA_dec x (restrict_code (x :: xs) c) ++ encode eqA_dec (restrict_code (x :: xs) c) xs" with "find_code eqA_dec x c ++ encode eqA_dec (restrict_code m (restrict_code xs c)) xs".

chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
m: list A
============================
forall c : code A, encode eqA_dec c m = encode eqA_dec (restrict_code m c) m

Related definitions and lemmas:
code = fun A : Type => list (A * list bool) : Type -> Type Arguments code _%type_scope
restrict_code = fun (m : list A) (c : code A) => map (fun x : A * nat => (fst x, find_code eqA_dec (fst x) c)) (frequency_list eqA_dec m) : list A -> code A -> code A Arguments restrict_code _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
restrict_code_encode_length : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), encode eqA_dec c m = encode eqA_dec (Weight.restrict_code eqA_dec m c) m
restrict_code_encode_incl : forall (m1 : list A) (c : code A), incl m1 m -> encode eqA_dec c m1 = encode eqA_dec (restrict_code m c) m1
restrict_code_encode_length_inc : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m m1 : list A) (c : code A), incl m1 m -> encode eqA_dec c m1 = encode eqA_dec (Weight.restrict_code eqA_dec m c) m1
encode_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (c : code A), encode eqA_dec c (l1 ++ l2) = encode eqA_dec c l1 ++ encode eqA_dec c l2
encode_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c1 c2 : code A), permutation c1 c2 -> unique_prefix c1 -> encode eqA_dec c1 m = encode eqA_dec c2 m
correct_encoding : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A), unique_prefix c -> not_null c -> forall m : list A, in_alphabet m c -> decode c (encode eqA_dec c m) = m
Weight.restrict_code_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (a : A) (c : code A), In a m -> find_code eqA_dec a c = find_code eqA_dec a (Weight.restrict_code eqA_dec m c)
restrict_code_in : forall (a : A) (c : code A), In a m -> find_code eqA_dec a c = find_code eqA_dec a (restrict_code m c)
restrict_code_unique_key : forall c : code A, unique_key (restrict_code m c)
frequency_not_null : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), 1 < length (frequency_list eqA_dec m) -> unique_prefix c -> in_alphabet m c -> not_null c
Weight.restrict_code_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), unique_key (Weight.restrict_code eqA_dec m c)
encode_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)) (m1 : list A), ~ In a m1 -> encode eqA_dec ((a, l1) :: l) m1 = encode eqA_dec l m1
frequency_length : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), unique_key c -> length (encode eqA_dec c m) = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : A * list bool) => a + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec (fst b) m * length (snd b)) c 0
encode_permutation_val : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m1 m2 : list A) (c : code A), permutation m1 m2 -> permutation (encode eqA_dec c m1) (encode eqA_dec c m2)
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
weight_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c1 : code A) (c2 : list (A * list bool)), unique_prefix c1 -> permutation c1 c2 -> weight eqA_dec m c1 = weight eqA_dec m c2
frequency_number_of_occurrences : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (m : list A), In a m -> In (a, number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) (frequency_list eqA_dec m)
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (n : nat) (m : list A), In (a, n) (frequency_list eqA_dec m) -> In a m
number_of_occurrences_permutation_ex : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (a : A), exists m1 : list A, permutation m (id_list a (number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) ++ m1) /\ ~ In a m1
add_frequency_list_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a : A) (n : nat), unique_key m -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, S n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a m)
frequency_list_unique : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), unique_key (frequency_list eqA_dec l)
add_frequency_list_not_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a b : A) (n : nat), a <> b -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec b m)
number_of_occurrences_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
find_code_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (c1 c2 : code A), permutation c1 c2 -> unique_prefix c1 -> find_code eqA_dec a c1 = find_code eqA_dec a c2
Weight.restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
